FuncDef:
The active ds-lite vsuf command enables the DS-Lite function on a specified VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S service board.
The undo active ds-lite vsuf command disables the DS-Lite function on a specified VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S service board.
By default, the DS-Lite function is enabled on a specified VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S service board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a service board.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The DS-Lite function has been enabled on a /centralized-boards/service board. Running the active ds-lite vsuf command is the prerequisites for performing DS-Lite functions. If a service board is Down or fails to be detected, the service board does not automatically release DS-Lite license resources. To release the license resources, run the undo active ds-lite vsuf command.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the active nat session-table size command to configure DS-Lite session table resources.
